name: intelligent species
description:
The game, aptly named, is set in a world where insects and animals are mixed together based on the player's level of resources.
But beware, as the game is violent and strong — highly scripted. Intelligent Animals (Rainbow) 'Intelligent Animals' is a stunning interactive game that tells the story of the world of 'Rainbow' using animations, music and graphics. The game plays out like an interactive, decade-long, feature film. The player has to collect resources, light trees and bushes, dig, fight, breed, sell and ride horses. The game's soundtrack is based on the soundtrack from the classic 'Simpsons' TV show that has inspired many other interactive games. The games are being released on Steam Early Access on November 16. Outhouse Media is aiming for a release on PC, Mac, Xbox and Nintendo Switch next year. The game is available now for PlayStation 4. The game was created by Outhouse Media, who published 'Rainbow' on PlayStation 3. Four new animals have also been announced at companies including Sony, Steam, Scribner, EA, Ubisoft and Harmonix — with more to come. For more information, visit www.intelligentanimals.com.
